kodkod.engine.bool
Class BooleanFormula

java.lang.Object
  kodkod.engine.bool.BooleanValue
      kodkod.engine.bool.BooleanFormula
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<BooleanValue>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BooleanVariable, MultiGate, NotGate
public abstract class BooleanFormula
extends BooleanValue

Represents a non-constant boolean value. A formula may be a variable, inverter or a multi-input circuit.

Author:
Emina Torlak
specfield:
inputs: set BooleanValue
